turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get some papa murphy's pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah sure what do you want me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get the Meditterannean pizza and the sriracha one?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You mean the herbed mediterrannean chicken and the thai chicken pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah those are the ones I want.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What sizes do you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: both large please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok cool, they're going to be $14.95 each is that good?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah that's fine you can pay with my card.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok do you want any sides or anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah can I get the brownie bites too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah an order of those is gonna be another $5.95

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah that's good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok do you want it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No can you pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, are all of your payment details on your account up to date?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah they are.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I've got it ordered, it'll be ready for me to pick it up in 25 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok awesome thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah no problem.
